name: Super Coconut Juggling
description:
Two Monkeys in the jungle just try and pass the time away by juggling coconuts.

The goal is to keep the coconut bouncing by tapping on correct monkey to kick the coconut when it drops.

This game is especially for children which will train their eyes, fingers, and combination of the two as well as help to improve their hand-eye coordination.

Easy gameplay but hard to master.

Game center enabled which allows you to compete with other players for top scores.

Good luck and have fun!




Music by Kevin Mcleod at incompetech.com
